languages.text: Хотя флот Осознание отвернулся от династии фон Валанциус, когда слухи об охватившей ее ереси стало невозможно игнорировать, целые эскадры вольнодумцев, презрев алгоритмы святости, бежали под крыло Вольного Торговца. Были среди них как старые поборники схизмы Прерывания, кои были рады любым переменам, так и просто мерзейшие еретеки, лишь ждавшие момента, чтобы открыть свое гнилое нутро.

Although the Cognisance Fleet turned its back on the von Valancius dynasty, when the rumours of the heresy that engulfed it became too much to ignore, entire squadrons of apostates who had disregarded the algorithms of sanctity sought the Rogue Trader's protection. Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, open to any change, while others were simply loathsome heretics eager to expose their rotten cores.
languages.original_text: Хотя флот Осознание отвернулся от династии фон Валанциус, когда слухи об охватившей ее ереси стало невозможно игнорировать, целые эскадры вольнодумцев, презрев алгоритмы святости, бежали под крыло Вольного Торговца. Были среди них как старые поборники схизмы Прерывания, кои были рады любым переменам, так и просто мерзейшие еретеки, лишь ждавшие момента, чтобы открыть свое гнилое нутро.

traits.locale_text: Even if Cognisance Fleet turned its back on the von Valancius dynasty, when the rumours about the heresy that engulfed it became too much to ignore, the entire squadrons of madmen, who disregarded the algorithms of sanctity, ran under the Rogue Trader's wing. Some of them were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, who were happy to see any change, others were simply hideous heretics, only waiting for a moment to show their rotten core.

Even if Cognisance Fleet turned its back on the von Valancius dynasty, when the rumours about the heresy that engulfed it became too much to ignore, the entire squadrons of madmen, who disregarded the algorithms of sanctity, ran under the Rogue Trader's wing. Some of them were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, who were happy to see any change, others were simply hideous heretics, only waiting for a moment to show their rotten core.

Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing who were happy to see any change, others were simply loathsome heretics just waiting to expose their rotten cores.

Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing who were happy to see any change, others were simply loathsome heretics just waiting to expose their rotten cores.

Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, open to any change, while others were simply loathsome heretics eager to expose their rotten cores.

Although the Cognisance Fleet turned its back on the von Valancius dynasty, when the rumours of the heresy that engulfed it became too much to ignore, entire squadrons of apostates who had disregarded the algorithms of sanctity sought the Rogue Trader's protection. Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, open to any change, while others were simply loathsome heretics eager to expose their rotten cores.

languages.text: 尽管真理开拓者舰队十分厌弃冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，但是，当关于异端邪说将会吞没舰队的谣言愈演愈烈时，舰队的叛教者最终决定无视神圣算法的限制，寻求行商浪人的庇护。这批人之中，一部分人“循环终止”派的忠实追随者，他们接受一切变革，而另一些人只不过是令人憎恶的异端，渴望展示他们腐坏的本质。
languages.original_text: Although the Cognisance Fleet turned its back on the von Valancius dynasty, when the rumours of the heresy that engulfed it became too much to ignore, entire squadrons of apostates who had disregarded the algorithms of sanctity sought the Rogue Trader's protection. Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, open to any change, while others were simply loathsome heretics eager to expose their rotten cores.

traits.locale_text: 尽管真理开拓者舰队十分厌弃冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，但是，当关于异端邪说将会吞没舰队的谣言愈演愈烈时，舰队的叛教者最终决定无视神圣算法的限制，寻求行商浪人的庇护。这批人之中，一部分人“循环终止”派的忠实追随者，他们乐于看到任何变革，而另一些人只不过是令人憎恶的异端，时刻愿意展示他们腐坏的本质。

languages.text: Die Erkenntnisflotte kehrte der Dynastie derer von Valancius den Rücken zu. Irgendwann aber ließen sich die Gerüchte um die Ketzerei in der Dynastie nicht mehr ignorieren. Ganze Geschwader von Apostaten, die die Algorithmen der Heiligkeit missachtet hatten, suchten den Schutz {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Einige waren alte Anhänger des Schismas der Unterbrechung, die offen für jeden Wandel waren. Andere waren schlicht widerwärtige Ketzer, die nur darauf warteten, ihre schändliche Natur zu offenbaren.
languages.original_text: Although the Cognisance Fleet turned its back on the von Valancius dynasty, when the rumours of the heresy that engulfed it became too much to ignore, entire squadrons of apostates who had disregarded the algorithms of sanctity sought the Rogue Trader's protection. Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, open to any change, while others were simply loathsome heretics eager to expose their rotten cores.

traits.locale_text: Die Erkenntnisflotte kehrte der Dynastie derer von Valancius den Rücken zu. Irgendwann aber ließen sich die Gerüchte um die Ketzerei in der Dynastie nicht mehr ignorieren. Ganze Geschwader von Apostaten, die die Algorithmen der Heiligkeit hatten, suchten den Schutz {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Einige waren alte Anhänger des Schismas der Unterbrechung, die über jeden Wandel froh waren. Andere waren schlicht widerwärtige Ketzer, die nur darauf warteten, ihre schändliche Natur zu offenbaren.

languages.text: Bien que la Flotte de la Connaissance eût tourné le dos à la dynastie von Valancius, des escadrons entiers d'apostats ayant fait fi des algorithmes de sainteté se placèrent sous la protection {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} lorsque les rumeurs de l'hérésie ayant gagné la flotte devinrent trop précises pour être ignorées. Certains étaient d'anciens partisans du schisme de l'interruption, ouverts au changement, et d'autres, de méprisables hérétiques attendant l'occasion de révéler leur exécrable nature.
languages.original_text: Although the Cognisance Fleet turned its back on the von Valancius dynasty, when the rumours of the heresy that engulfed it became too much to ignore, entire squadrons of apostates who had disregarded the algorithms of sanctity sought the Rogue Trader's protection. Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, open to any change, while others were simply loathsome heretics eager to expose their rotten cores.

traits.locale_text: Bien que la Flotte de la Connaissance eût tourné le dos à la dynastie von Valancius, des escadrons entiers d'apostats ayant fait fi des algorithmes de sainteté se placèrent sous la protection {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} lorsque les rumeurs de l'hérésie ayant gagné la flotte devinrent trop précises pour être ignorées. Certains étaient d'anciens partisans du schisme de l’interruption heureux de voir la situation évoluer, et d'autres, de méprisables hérétiques attendant la première occasion pour révéler leur exécrable nature.

languages.text: Aunque la Flota Conciencia dio la espalda a la dinastía von Valancius, cuando los rumores de la herejía que la consumía eran demasiado numerosos como para ignorarlos, escuadrones enteros de apóstatas que habían abandonado los algoritmos santos buscaron la protección de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Algunos eran antiguos seguidores del cisma de la Discontinuidad, abiertos a cualquier tipo de cambio, mientras que otros no eran más que herejes abominables deseando hacer gala de su corrupción.
languages.original_text: Although the Cognisance Fleet turned its back on the von Valancius dynasty, when the rumours of the heresy that engulfed it became too much to ignore, entire squadrons of apostates who had disregarded the algorithms of sanctity sought the Rogue Trader's protection. Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, open to any change, while others were simply loathsome heretics eager to expose their rotten cores.

traits.locale_text: Aunque la Flota Conciencia dio la espalda a la dinastía von Valancius, cuando los rumores de la herejía que la consumía eran demasiado numerosos como para ignorarlos, escuadrones enteros de apóstatas que habían abandonado los algoritmos santos buscaron la protección de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Algunos eran antiguos seguidores del cisma de la Discontinuidad que se alegraban por cualquier tipo de cambio, mientras que otros no eran más que herejes abominables deseando hacer gala de su corrupción.

languages.text: コグニサンス艦隊がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に背を向けたものの、艦隊を襲った異端の噂が無視できぬほどに大きくなると、高潔なアルゴリズムを顧みない背教者の全艦隊は一様に自由開拓者の庇護を求めた。ある者は廃絶の分派の古い信者であり、あらゆる変化を歓迎した。またある者は、ただ己の腐った性根をさらけ出そうとしているような、唾棄すべき異端の徒だったという。
languages.original_text: Although the Cognisance Fleet turned its back on the von Valancius dynasty, when the rumours of the heresy that engulfed it became too much to ignore, entire squadrons of apostates who had disregarded the algorithms of sanctity sought the Rogue Trader's protection. Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, open to any change, while others were simply loathsome heretics eager to expose their rotten cores.

traits.locale_text: コグニサンス艦隊がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に背を向けたものの、艦隊を襲った異端の噂が無視できぬほどに大きくなると、高潔なアルゴリズムを顧みない背教者の全艦隊は一様に自由開拓者の庇護を求めた。ある者は廃絶の分派の古い信者であり、あらゆる変化を歓迎した。またある者は、ただ己の腐った性根をさらけ出そうとしているような、唾棄すべき異端の徒だったという。

languages.text: Malumat Filosu'nun von Valancius hanedanlığına sırtını dönmüş olmasına rağmen filoyla ilgili kâfirlik söylentilerinin artması, bunların görmezden gelinmesini imkânsız kıldı. Algoritmaların mukaddesliğini kabul etmeyen dinden çıkmışlardan oluşan eskadralar, Hür Tacir'in koruması altına girmek istedi. Bunların bazıları; her türlü değişime açık, eski Bozulum bölünmesinin takipçileriydi. Kalanlarsa özlerindeki çürümüşlüğü açığa çıkarmaya hevesli, menfur kâfirlerdi.
languages.original_text: Although the Cognisance Fleet turned its back on the von Valancius dynasty, when the rumours of the heresy that engulfed it became too much to ignore, entire squadrons of apostates who had disregarded the algorithms of sanctity sought the Rogue Trader's protection. Some were old followers of the schism of Discontinuing, open to any change, while others were simply loathsome heretics eager to expose their rotten cores.

traits.locale_text: Malumat Filosu, von Valancius hanedanlığına sırtını dönmüş bile olsa, hanenin etrafında toplanan kâfirlik söylentileri o kadar fazlalaştı ki, bunu daha fazla görmezden gelemedi. Algoritmaların mukaddesliğini kabul etmeyen dinden çıkmışlardan oluşan eskadralar, Hür Tacir'in koruması altına girmek istedi. Bunların bazıları, her türlü değişime açık, eski Devamsızlık anlayışının takipçileriydi. Geri kalanıysa özlerindeki çürümüşlüğü açığa çıkarmak için hevesli, menfur kâfirlerden ibaretti.
